channel.title: Help / Summaries for all your books
channel.description: If you need help with certain literature, check www.sparknotes.com for guides on highschool corriculem(however its spelled) books and plays. They have summaries, analysis, and key points.

item.title: Help / Summaries for all your books
item.dc:creator: @anarkial anarkial
item.description:
@anarkial wrote:

One thing to add though, maybe if obvious, is that:

You should never copy from this site at all, even if you're not worried about copyright infringement, unfortunately because this is often a teacher's first or second reference when reading a book.

Paraphrasing might work though, with a bad teacher...

Read full topic
